# Database document descriptions
## User

    {
        // generated by Mongo
        _id: string; 
        // Username
        username: string;
        // User password hash
        passwordHash: string;
    }


## Party

    {
        // Generated by mongo
        _id: string;
        // List of _id's for Users that are on this party
        memberIds: string[]
        // Party leader, mongo _id for User
        partyLeaderId: string;
    }


## Task

    {
        _id: string;
        title: string;
        description: string;
        locationLatitude: string;
        locationLongitude: string;

    }
